Background:
Guardian of the West-Northwest and one of the Twelve Divine Generals. 
 Revered as a deity of war along with her canine partner Garjana, she is steadfast and determined in her pursuit of strength. 
 Her purity of heart allows her to hear the voices of the natural world, making her an invaluable asset to the crew.
Background_JP:
西北西を護りし十二神将が一人。
半身であるガルジャナを伴った犬神は、しなやかに強さの果てを追い求める。
闘神として名を轟かせる少女の無垢なる心は、天地に満ちる数多の声を聞き、一行の旅を頼もしく導くだろう。
